data.title: Cleveland Cavaliers Roster
data.meta_description: Cleveland Cavaliers scores, news, schedule, players, stats, rumors, depth charts and more on RealGM.com
data.text:
Daniel Gibson was selected as the #12 pick in the Second Round of the 2006 NBA Draft by the Cleveland Cavaliers. Daniel Gibson signed a multi-year contract with the Cleveland Cavaliers on July 7, 2006. Daniel Gibson re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Cleveland Cavaliers on July 15, 2008.

Kyrie Irving was selected as the #1 pick in the First Round of the 2011 NBA Draft by the Cleveland Cavaliers. Kyrie Irving signed a multi-year contract with the Cleveland Cavaliers on December 9, 2011.

Tristan Thompson was selected as the #4 pick in the First Round of the 2011 NBA Draft by the Cleveland Cavaliers. Tristan Thompson signed a multi-year contract with the Cleveland Cavaliers on December 15, 2011.

Dion Waiters was selected as the #4 pick in the First Round of the 2012 NBA Draft by the Cleveland Cavaliers. Dion Waiters signed a multi-year contract with the Cleveland Cavaliers on July 5, 2012.

Draft Rights to Anderson Varejao, the #1 pick in the Second Round of the 2004 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Cleveland Cavaliers from the Orlando Magic on July 23, 2004. Anderson Varejao signed a multi-year contract with the Cleveland Cavaliers on August 18, 2004. Anderson Varejao re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Cleveland Cavaliers on December 7, 2007. Anderson Varejao re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Cleveland Cavaliers on July 10, 2009.

Draft Rights to Tyler Zeller, the #17 pick in the First Round of the 2012 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Cleveland Cavaliers from the Dallas Mavericks on June 28, 2012. Tyler Zeller signed a multi-year contract with the Cleveland Cavaliers on July 5, 2012.

Omri Casspi was acquired in a trade by the Cleveland Cavaliers from the Sacramento Kings on June 30, 2011.

Wayne Ellington was acquired in a trade by the Cleveland Cavaliers from the Memphis Grizzlies on January 22, 2013.

Marreese Speights was acquired in a trade by the Cleveland Cavaliers from the Memphis Grizzlies on January 22, 2013.

Luke Walton was acquired in a trade by the Cleveland Cavaliers from the Los Angeles Lakers on March 15, 2012.
